Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the frog skin active peptide family (Brevinin subfamily)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacterium:Escherichia coli (MIC=12.5 µM);Gram-positive bacterium:Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=50 µM).Yeast:Candida albicans (MIC>100 µM).
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Comments: No comments found on DRAMP database

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial peptides from diverse families isolated from the skin of the Asian frog, Rana grahami.
Literature.Author: Conlon JM, Al-Ghaferi N, Abraham B, Jiansheng H, Cosette P, Leprince J, Jouenne T, Vaudry H.

Literature.Title: Anti-infection peptidomics of amphibian skin.
Literature.Author: Li J, Xu X, Xu C, Zhou W, Zhang K, Yu H, Zhang Y, Zheng Y, Rees HH, Lai R, Yang D, Wu J.
